title: Best of The Herd for Aug 06, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 06, 2020
description:
The Lakers are not a true #1 seed

Colin doesn't care about the Cowboys putting up big numbers

This 76ers thing is never going to work

The Ravens could go 16-0

Colin ranks his top ten NFL offenses


Guest: Tristan Thompson, NBA Champion

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
